persona.desc: Seraphim (singular "Seraph") are the highest angelic class and serve as the caretakers of God's throne and continuously shout praises: "Holy, holy, holy is the Lord of hosts; the whole earth is full of his glory!" According to Christian religious texts, the Seraphim have six wings: two to covered their face, two to covered their feet and two to fly.
persona.name: Seraph

1.desc: Moderate chance to instant-kill all foes with light damage
1.name: Mahamaon

5.desc: Raises damage of all light attacks
5.name: Hama Boost

persona.desc: Cherubim have four faces: one of each a man, an ox, a lion, and an eagle. They have four conjoined wings covered with eyes, a lion's body figure, and they have ox's feet. Cherubim guard the way to the tree of life in the Garden of Eden and the throne of God. Modern usage has blurred the distinction between cherubim and putti, the winged human baby/toddler-like beings traditionally used in figurative art.
persona.name: Cherub

1.desc: Moderate chance to instant-kill one foe with light damage.
1.name: Hamaon

3.desc: Chance to instill rage in all foes
3.name: Infuriate

persona.desc: In the Christian hierarchy of angels, Dominions are part of the second sphere and are said to watch over nations and regulate the duties of lesser angels. In Moses Maimonides' hierarchy of angels according to Jewish lore, they are Hashmallim, the fourth rank of angels, and are mentioned briefly in the Hebrew version of the Book of Ezekiel.
persona.name: Dominion

items.text:
Place camera
MC walks

MC turns around
Elizabeth runs up to him

1.speaker: Elizabeth
1.text: I have a question I would like to ask.

show.text: I have a question I would like to ask.
show.speaker: sprite_Elizabeth_emotion

1.speaker: Elizabeth
1.text: Some time ago, there was another guest... He showed me the world outside of this Velvet Room...

show.text: Some time ago, there was another guest... He showed me the world outside of this Velvet Room...
show.speaker: sprite_Elizabeth_emotion

1.speaker: Elizabeth
1.text: This person... he also held the power that is now yours.

show.text: This person... he also held the power that is now yours.
options:
MC turns around
Elizabeth runs up to him
I have a question I would like to ask.
show.speaker: sprite_Elizabeth_emotion

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Do you know something about my power?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Is this relevant?

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: I am only an assistant here. The nature of your power I know only through what I have witnessed from your predecessor.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: I am still interested in him, and your world, however.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: Have you heard of such a person?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: What's he like?

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: Maybe...

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Nope.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: A... handsome young man; caring, genius charismatic badass.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: A true hero among men.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: He deserves to be celebrated for what he did.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: You seem to hold him in high regard.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Which is what, exactly?

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: I respect him as much as he is worth respecting.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: It is saddening... He was a great man.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: You are more in debt to him than you realize...

items.speaker: MC
items.text: That's true for a lot of people.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: What did he do?

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: You make a good point.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: None-the-less, I hold a special place in my heart for him.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: After all, my first time was with him...

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: First time out of the Velvet Room, that is.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: I think I hear my master calling. I should go.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: Thank you for your time.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: He... left. He had to, in order to protect his friends...

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: I knew him through business here, but I still wonder of his interactions in your world.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: It is good to know that perhaps a part of him lives on.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: The short version is that he saved the world.

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: The long version...

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: Perhaps not...

items.speaker: Elizabeth
items.text: All the same, I simply cannot help myself. His image is consuming my mind, I must know!
